thread.title: We’ve All Got Too Much Trump on Our Minds

author: Joseph Epstein
title: We’ve All Got Too Much Trump on Our Minds
text: Donald Trump may know little about the intricacies of government, but there can be no doubt that he is a genius at attracting publicity. Without Mr. Trump, the New York Times would have to begin each day on page 2. Turn on any television station, with the possible exception of the Animal or Cooking channel, and there he is, our president, seated in the Oval Office or at a table with ever-changing cabinet members, on the golf course at Mar-a-Lago, on the White House lawn a helicopter whirring noisily in the background, yelling out pronunciamentos, ukases, diktats, promises, all of which may be contradicted if not contravened...
